param.name: custom1
param.label: Custom Field 1
param.description: Hide, Show, or Required

param.name: custom1Label
param.label: Label
param.description: What the user will see

param.name: custom1Value
param.label: Default Text
param.description: Option or text that will be selected or displayed when visiting the form for the first time, or if the form is reset.

param.name: custom1ErrorMessage
param.label: Error Message
param.description: The warning which will be displayed to the user, if this field is required, and is not filled out upon submit.

param.name: custom1Type
param.label: Type
param.description: Choose the type of element to use

param.name: custom1Values
param.label: Values
param.description:
List of values.
(Comma- or Pipe-delimited.)

Only used if Type is Drop-down, Radio or Checkboxes.

param.name: custom1Mask
param.label: Input Mask
param.description:
a - Represents an alpha character (A-Z,a-z)
9 - Represents a numeric character (0-9)
* - Represents an alphanumeric character (A-Z,a-z,0-9)
Anything listed after '?' within the mask is considered optional user input.

Example: Phone Number, with optional extension;
999-999-9999? x99999

param.name: custom1HelpTitle
param.label: Help Title
param.description: Link text visible to the user.

param.name: custom1HelpText
param.label: Help Text
param.description: Helpful information to be displayed to the user when a link is clicked.

param.name: captcha
param.label: CAPTCHA
param.description: Completely Automated Public Turing Test to tell Computers and Humans Apart

param.name: captcha-public
param.label: Public Key
param.description: Your reCAPTCHA Public Key. Use this in the JavaScript code that is served to your users.

param.name: captcha-private
param.label: Private Key
param.description: Your reCAPTCHA Private Key. Use this when communicating between your server and our server. Be sure to keep it a secret.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the CSS class of the Module. This allows for individual Module styling.

param.name: sendemail
param.label: Email To
param.description: Email address where all completed forms should be sent.

param.name: table
param.label: Database Table
param.description: Where to store registration information. #_ is used as the Joomla! table prefix.

param.name: successnotice
param.label: Success Notice
param.description: This is used only when there are no events, and everything succeeds.

param.name: dberror
param.default: We are sorry for the inconvenience, but there was an error saving your data. Please try again.
param.label: Save Data Error Message
param.description: Message to be displayed if data cannot be saved.

field.name: captcha
field.label: CAPTCHA
field.description: Completely Automated Public Turing Test to tell Computers and Humans Apart

field.name: captcha-public
field.label: Public Key
field.description: Your reCAPTCHA Public Key. Use this in the JavaScript code that is served to your users.

field.name: captcha-private
field.label: Private Key
field.description: Your reCAPTCHA Private Key. Use this when communicating between your server and our server. Be sure to keep it a secret.

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the CSS class of the Module. This allows for individual Module styling.

field.name: sendemail
field.label: Email To
field.description: Email address(es) where completed forms should be sent. Multiple addresses should be comma-separated, please.

field.name: table
field.label: Database Table
field.description: Where to store registration information. #_ is used as the Joomla! table prefix.

field.name: successnotice
field.label: Success Notice
field.description: This is used only when there are no events, and everything succeeds.

field.name: dberror
field.default: We are sorry for the inconvenience, but there was an error saving your data. Please try again.
field.label: Save Data Error Message
field.description: Message to be displayed if data cannot be saved.
